articles.description: The U.S. Attorney’s Office in Maryland is accusing three men in a scheme to sell COVID-19 vaccines through a fraudulent website.
articles.content:
BALTIMORE A federal prosecutor said three men are accused in a scheme to sell COVID-19 vaccines through a fraudulent website.
